title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The Curious Case of the Bizarre, Disappearing Captcha
items.description: While puzzling captchas—from dogs in hats to sliding jockstraps—still exist, most bot-deterring challenges have vanished into the background.

items.title: LG founder’s grandson, production firm partner up to bring AI to filmmaking
items.description: Brian Koo’s Stock Farm Road and Utopai Studios have partnered up to form Utopai East, an AI-powered film production company.

items.title: Microsoft inks $9.7B deal with Australia’s IREN for AI cloud capacity
items.description: The deal will give Microsoft access to compute infrastructure built with Nvidia's GB300 GPUs, which will be deployed over phases through 2026.

items.title: 15 Best Travel Toiletry Bags, Tested Over Many Miles (2025)
